data_analysis.r.content:
# R Data Analysis Example
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

# Create sample data
set.seed(42)
df <- tibble(
  date = seq(as.Date("2024-01-01"), by = "day", length.out = 100),
  sales = rnorm(100, mean = 1000, sd = 200),
  category = sample(c("A", "B", "C"), 100, replace = TRUE)
)

# Summary statistics by category
summary_stats <- df %>%
  group_by(category) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    mean_sales = mean(sales),
    sd_sales = sd(sales),
    median_sales = median(sales),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

print(summary_stats)

# Time series plot
ggplot(df, aes(x = date, y = sales, color = category)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", se = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "Daily Sales by Category",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Sales ($)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set2")

# Box plot comparison
ggplot(df, aes(x = category, y = sales, fill = category)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, alpha = 0.3) +
  labs(title = "Sales Distribution by Category") +
  theme_minimal()
